grades_analysis.name: course_id
grades_analysis.description: Course key of the containing course. In the format course-v1:org+course+run for courses created after DATE and in the format org/course/run for older courses.

grades_analysis.name: grade_overall_cutoff_for_pass
grades_analysis.description: From the grading_policy table (parsed from course.tar.gz), the 'overall_cutoff_*' passing grade for the course

grades_analysis.name: grade_latest_pass
grades_analysis.description: True if the user's latest grade is greater than the passing grade from the grading policy table

grades_analysis.name: grade_latest
grades_analysis.description: Latest generated grade from all known grade sources (certificates, grade persistent, edx instructor dashboards)

grades_analysis.name: grade_latest_timestamp
grades_analysis.description: Latest generated grade timestamp from all known grade sources (certificates, grade persistent, edx instructor dashboards)

grades_analysis.name: grade_latest_source
grades_analysis.description: Latest generated grade source when comparing timestamps from all grade sources (certificates, grade persistent, edx instructor dashboards)

grades_analysis.name: grade_cert
grades_analysis.description: Certificate 'grade' column from edX 'certificates_generatedcertificate' table. The grade computed the last time certificate generation ran. If the course, learner state, or grading_policy change, the value in this column can be different than the grade shown on a learner's Progress page

grades_analysis.name: grade_persistent
grades_analysis.description: Grade persistent 'percent_grade' column from edX 'grades_persistentcoursegrade' table. The learner's calculated course grade as a decimal percentage, per grading policy. For example, 0.91 (meaning 91%).

grades_analysis.name: grade_edxdash
grades_analysis.description: edX instructor dashboard grade downloaded from grade report, if 'grade_reports' command has been run to programmatically download grades from edX instructor dashboards grade report

grades_analysis.name: grade_cert_created_date
grades_analysis.description: Certificate 'created' column from edX 'certificates_generatedcertificate' table. Date this row in the database was created.

grades_analysis.name: grade_cert_modified_date
grades_analysis.description: Certificate 'modified' column from edX 'certificates_generatedcertificate' table. Date this row in the database was modified.

grades_analysis.name: grade_persistent_created
grades_analysis.description: Grade Persistent, Time the course grade was first calculated for this user for this course

grades_analysis.name: grade_persistent_modified
grades_analysis.description: Grade Persistent, Time the course grade was last updated for this user for this course

grades_analysis.name: grade_persistent_passed_timestamp
grades_analysis.description: Grade Persitent, Time when the leraner first passed the course. If this cell value is empty, the learner never passed the course. If this cell value is non-empty but the letter_grade value is empty, the learner transitioned from passing to not passing

grades_analysis.name: grade_persistent_first_attempted_problem_subsection
grades_analysis.description: Grade Persistent Subsection, Time of the user's first attempt at a problem in the subsection. If the user has not attempted a subsection, the entry for that subsection will be absent.

grades_analysis.name: grade_edxdash_timestamp
grades_analysis.description: EdX Instructor dashboard date string when 'grade_reports' command has been run to programmatically download grades from edX Instructor dashboards grade report
